CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnMapEnter
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local item = _EntityService:GetEntitiesByTag("Item") for key, value in pairs(item) do value.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.Id == _UserService.LocalPlayer.Id then self.Entity.Enable = false TriggerBodyEntity.ItemSkillQ:AddSkill() TriggerBodyEntity.GetItem:SaveItem() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if self.action == true then if key == KeyboardKey.Q then _EffectService:PlayEffectAttached("f396262ddb6e4d5581360496bb4e9f86",_UserService.LocalPlayer,Vector3(0,0,0), 0, Vector3(1,1,1), false) end end
